distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for libcdio fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2017-18201: Fixed a double free vulnerability (bsc#1082877).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: An issue was discovered in GNU libcdio before 2.0.0. There is a double free in get_cdtext_generic() in lib/driver/_cdio_generic.c.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
